Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initialize DevJourney project

- Next.js 14+ \(App Router\) + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
- Supabase client setup \(browser + server\)
- TanStack Query, Zustand, React Hook Form + Zod
- shadcn/ui dependencies \(Radix, lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge\)
- @dnd-kit \(Kanban\), Recharts \(charts\), Framer Motion
- Vitest + React Testing Library test setup
- 7 planning docs \(PRD, TRD, User Flow, DB Design, Design System, Screens, Coding Convention\)
- 11 screen specs \(YAML v2.0\) + domain resources + shared components/types
- TASKS.md with 39 tasks across 5 phases
- Agent team: backend/frontend/database/test specialists
- Orchestrate command for automated development workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
